thread.title: Fundraiser by Easy R Equine Rescue to aid abused horses
thread.title_full: Fundraiser by Easy R Equine Rescue to aid abused horses

author: Staff
title: Fundraiser by Easy R Equine Rescue to aid abused horses
text:
Fundraiser by Easy R Equine Rescue to aid abused horses Posted: October 16, 2015 - 12:00am Photos 
Easy R Equine Rescue will host its third annual Heroes for Horses fundraiser at 7 p.m. Friday at the Texas Tech Club at Jones AT&T Stadium. 
Tickets are $40 for the general public, and $25 for children age 12 and younger. Tickets can be purchased online at easyrequinerescue.org. Patrons should use the stadiumâ€™s west side for parking and entrance. 
Dinner will be catered by the Texas Tech Club, with classic country music provided by Steve Burrus and the High Plains Drifters. 
In addition, there is a silent auction. 
Four vacations, valued between $5,000 and $6,000, will be given away via a raffle. The raffle prizes are: Sonoma Wine & Dine Package, Chicago Cubs Wrigley Field Rooftop Experience Package; Rod & Reel Fishing Getaway, locations vary; and Park City, Utah Ski Package. All trips are a three-night stay for two people, with airfare included. Winner need not be present to win. Raffle tickets are $25, or five for $100. 
The Masked Rider and her horse, Fearless Champion, will make an appearance in the parking lot adjacent to the west entrance. 
The mission, vision and programs of Easy R. Equine Rescue will be shared, and all proceeds go directly toward the cost of rescuing and rehabilitating horses that have been abused, neglected, abandoned or displaced. TAGS:
